title: Heliotropium tenellum
text:
Heliotropium tenellum, the pasture heliotrope, is a species of <a href="plant">plant</a> in the <a href="Heliotropiaceae">heliotrope family</a>. It is native to southeastern and south-central North America, where it is found in limestone <a href="Cedar%20glade">glades</a> and rocky <a href="prairies">prairies</a>.
It is an <a href="annual%20plant">annual</a> species that produces white flowers in the summer.
